mapper.sql: rbs.ht_base_station_id, rbs.base_station_id, rbs.base_station_code, rbs.base_station_name, rbs.base_station_desc, rbs.base_station_model, rbs.area_id, rbs.base_station_ip, rbs.base_station_mac, rbs.`status`, rbs.remark, rbs.org_id, rbs.create_user_id, rbs.create_time, rbs.modified_user_id, rbs.modified_time, rbs.option1, rbs.option2, rbs.option3
mapper.select:
select , ra.area_code,ra.area_name, u.user_name as create_user_name, s.user_name as modified_user_name, bo.organization_name from fantech_imes_v2.rfid_ht_base_station rbs left join fantech_imes_v2.rfid_area ra ON rbs.area_id = ra.area_id left join ocean_v2.sys_user u on rbs.create_user_id=u.user_id left join ocean_v2.sys_user s on rbs.modified_user_id=s.user_id left join fantech_imes_v2.base_organization bo ON rbs.org_id = bo.organization_id
and rbs.base_station_code like CONCAT('%', #{baseStationCode}, '%')
and rbs.base_station_name like CONCAT('%', #{baseStationName}, '%')
and rbs.base_station_desc like CONCAT('%', #{baseStationDesc}, '%')
and rbs.base_station_model like CONCAT('%', #{baseStationModel}, '%')
and rbs.base_station_ip like CONCAT('%', #{baseStationIp}, '%')
and rbs.base_station_mac like CONCAT('%', #{baseStationMac}, '%')
and ra.area_code like CONCAT('%', #{areaCode}, '%')
and ra.area_name like CONCAT('%', #{areaName}, '%')
and rbs.remark like CONCAT('%', #{remark}, '%')
and rbs.status = #{status}
and date_format(rbs.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and rbs.org_id=#{orgId}
order by rbs.create_time desc
